I have completed all of the necessary steps. When I go to run the game an error pos up d3dx9_38.dll, it tells me to reinstall the game and I have several times and still i get the same error code. does anybody know how to fix this?

I have completed all of the necessary steps. When I go to run the game an error pops up d3dx9_38.dll, it tells me to reinstall the game and I have several times and still i get the same error code. does anybody know how to fix this?

@kevinstyles  I think the missing file "d3dx9_38.dll" is associated with Directx software.  Install the Directx9.0 program when it asks you to while installing FalloutNV.  I had the same problem with a similar file name.  hope that helps

@kevinstyles  I think the missing file "d3dx9_38.dll" is associated with Directx software.  Install the Directx9.0 program when it asks you to while installing FalloutNV.  I had a similar problem.  hope that helps

to you downloaders that get the 'application load error 5:0000065434, you havent cracked the game.
go to the SKIDROW folder and drag the launcher and the other item in the new vegas folder and click replace and then try
      Hope This Helps!
